title: 2002년 State v. Lovell Walker II 사건
summary: 미국 Missouri, MO 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: State v. Lovell Walker II. 판결일: 2002-09-17. 법원: Missouri Court of Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: STATE of Missouri v. Lovell WALKER II
**판결일**: 2002-09-17
**법원**: Missouri Court of Appeals
**관할**: Missouri, MO

**판사**: Smith, Spinden, Ulrich

## 변호인

Jeannie M. Willibey, Vanessa Caleb, Asst. Public Defenders, Kansas City, for appellant., Jeremiah W. (Jay) Nixon, Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, Philip M. Koppe, Asst. Atty. Gen., Kansas City, for respondent.

## 인용

- 84 S.W.3d 173

## 판결문 요약


ORDER
Lovell Walker II appeals the circuit court’s judgment convicting him of one count of statutory rape in the first degree and two counts statutory sodomy in the first degree. We affirm. Rule 30.25(b).
...
